Release Notes:
Fix:
SOW dashboard to display details under any line item for Production site (72-16061) and future sites with the same conditions. 
New:
Implement a Consult checkbox within the Site Profile to be leveraged when inspectors have to meet with the home owner for more information after an inspection was performed. The BOC role will have access to edit the checkbox. The checkbox can be seen next to the Step checkbox, that’s next to the Lat/Long fields in the top section.
